# Import the data
```{r}
data1 <- read.csv("quiz4 data.csv")
```

```{r}
library(car)

```

```{r}
row_ind<-sample(1:nrow(data1),3000)
train<-data1[row_ind,]
valid<-data1[-row_ind,]
```

```{r}
basicmodel<-lm(Y~., data=train, trace=FALSE)
basicmodelstep<-step(basicmodel, direction="backward", trace = FALSE)

#bestmodel <- lm(Y~.^2,data=data1)
#bestmodelstep <- step(bestmodel, direction = "backward", trace = FALSE)

#summary(bestmodelstep)
summary(basicmodelstep)
```

```{r}
RMSE_train <- sqrt(mean((train$Y-predict(basicmodelstep))^2))
RMSE_valid <- sqrt(mean((valid$Y-predict(basicmodelstep,newdata=valid))^2))
```
